words.source: H7725 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of שׁוּב 'to return'; KJV 'returned', ESV 'turned', NASB 'returned'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H136 n.mp + 1cs suff. אֲדֹנָי 'Lord, master'; KJV 'Lord', ESV 'O Lord', NASB 'Lord'
H4100 prep. l- + interrog. pron. מָה 'what'; KJV 'wherefore', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H7489 Hiphil perf. 2ms of רָעַע 'to be evil, to do evil to'; KJV 'hast thou so evil entreated', ESV 'have you done evil', NASB 'have You brought harm'
H5971 prep. l- + def. art. + n.ms עַם 'people'; KJV 'this people', ESV 'this people', NASB 'this people'
H2088 def. art. + dem. pron. זֶה 'this'; all trans. agree
H4100 prep. l- + interrog. pron. מָה 'what'; KJV 'why is it', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H2088 dem. pron. 'this'; emphasizes the question; KJV 'is it that', ESV 'did', NASB 'did'
H7971 Qal perf. 2ms + 1cs suff. of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'thou hast sent me', ESV 'you ever sent me', NASB 'You sent me'
